meanings.definition: The quality or state of being circular.
meanings.sent1: The circularness of the tire made it easy to roll.
meanings.sent2: The circularness of the table made it fit perfectly in the corner.
meanings.sent3: The circularness of the pizza caused a debate on who gets the last slice.
meanings.sent4: The circularness of the moon in the night sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The circularness of the hula hoop made it fun for the kids to play with.

meanings.definition: The property of having a circular shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The circularness of the clock helped us tell the time easily.
meanings.sent2: The circularness of the pond made it a peaceful spot for reflection.
meanings.sent3: The circularness of the donut tempted me to take a bite.
meanings.sent4: The circularness of the carousel brought joy to the children at the park.
meanings.sent5: The circularness of the ring symbolized eternity in their marriage.
